Entertainment.Birthday: Hooray! It's our little {0} birthday[enter][enter]Happy Birthday to You :notes:[enter]Happy Birthday to You[enter]Happy Birthday Dear {1} :notes:[enter]Happy Birthday to You[enter][enter]From good friends and true :notes:[enter]From old friends and new[enter]May good luck go with you :notes:[enter]And happiness too.

Invalid.Missing: I couldn't find any custom commands named `{0}`.

CustomCommand.Default: There are {1} custom commands on this server.[enter][enter]To run a custom command, simply use this server's command prefix followed by the command title[enter]Example: `{0}bye` ->_ `Cya`[enter][enter]You can add a custom command with `{0}customcommand add _<command title>_ _<response>_`[enter]If you want the command title to exist of multiple words, combine them withing double quotes (i.e. "say hi").[enter]The response will be send in the same channel the custom command is send in.[enter][enter]You can also remove a custom command with `/customcommand remove _<command title>_`.
CustomCommand.Title: Custom Commands
CustomCommand.Added: I've added `{0}` to this server's custom commands. :thumbsup:
CustomCommand.Removed: I've removed `{0}` from this server's custom commands. :thumbsup:

Kick.Default: Kick a user from the discord with `{0}kick _<username/mention>_`.

Ban.Default: You can ban a user from the discord with `{0}ban _<username/mention>_ _<optional: reason>_`.[enter]Enter a reason if you want to see later why that user was banned.[enter][enter]If you want a ban to be temporary, you can add the duration with `{0}ban _<username/mention>_ _<duration>_ _<optional: reason>_`.[enter]Keep in mind this does not work on existing bans.[enter]The format for duration is `_<number>__<optional: metric type>_`.[enter]The type can be of[enter]    - s/sec/second/seconds[enter]    - m/min/minute/minutes[enter]    - h/hour/hours[enter]    - d/day/days[enter]Example: `{0}ban D-Kay 4h Spamming`

Channel.Default: Dynamic channels help you to keep your server clean by removing the need for voice channels that only serve to provide a channel for if and when users need it.[enter]Think of channels like `voice 1`, `voice 2`, etc.[enter]When a user joins a dynamic channel, I will duplicate that channel, including all settings, and move the user to this new channel.[enter]I'll also provide the user with the `Manage Channel` permission, for that channel only, so they can modify it to their needs.[enter][enter]The duplicated channel can be of two types: __Permanent__ and __Temporary__.[enter]Permanent channels will, as the name suggests, remain on the server until it is manually removed.[enter]Temporary channels I will remove once everyone has left said channel.[enter]This way, you won't get any clutter of channels.[enter][enter]You can also change the name I should give to the duplicated channel.[enter]This name accepts a parameter in the form of `[user]` where I will enter the possessive form of the user's name.[enter]Example: `[user] channel` ->_ `D-Kay's channel`
Channel.Added: Configuration `{0}` has been created. Remember to assign channels to it.
Channel.Deleted: Configuration `{0}` has been removed. Note that any remaining channels that have been made with this will have to be deleted manually.
Channel.Renamed: Duplicated channels from {0} will now be named `{1}`.

Invalid.None: I was unable to find any running poll for that message. Are you sure it's still active?

Poll.Default: Polls can be easily created with the format `<text> <optional: duration> <options>`.[enter]If a duration is specified, I will post the result in the same channel as the poll after the duration has passed.[enter]To cancel a poll, simple delete the message.[enter] [enter]The duration can be specified as a number and the unit of time.[enter]If you do not specify a unit of time, the number will be seen as days.[enter]You can also enter multiple different durations to get even more specific.[enter]Durations are separated with `|`.[enter][enter]You can specify up to 26 different options.[enter]Options are separated with `|`.[enter][enter]Supported units of time:[enter]Minutes => m, min, minute, minutes[enter]Hours => h, hour, hours[enter]Days => d, day, days[enter]Weeks => w, week, weeks[enter][enter]Examples:[enter]`!poll "What is your favorite color?" 3w|4days Blue|Yellow|Green|Purple|Red|Pink|Other`[enter]`!poll "How old are you?" 2day|9h|30min 12 - 18|19 - 25|26 - 32|33 - 39|40 - 46|47 - 53|54 - 60|60 >`[enter]`!poll "How did we meet?" 3 Chatroom|Online multiplayer|School`[enter]`!poll "Do you like it here?" Absolutely|It's alright|Not really|I don't even know why I'm still here`

Welcome.Exception: Something went wrong with the welcome notification for your server `{0}`.[enter] This may be due to the deletion and recreation of the configured channel.[enter] I disabled the notification for now.[enter] You can re-enable it by using the configuring command again.

Invalid.Missing: The name or mention of a user is required as a target.
Invalid.Enabled: The welcome notification is already active on this channel.
Invalid.Disabled: The welcome notification is not active.

Welcome.Enabled: I will now welcome any new member in {0}.
Welcome.Disabled: The welcome notification has now been disabled. You can still use my normal command to activate it manually.

Message.Invalid: The message may not be empty.
Message.Current: The welcome message for {1} is:[enter]```[enter]{0}[enter]```[enter]When changing your notification message, you can use `[user]` as a placeholder for the mention of the user.
Message.Changed: The notification message for {1} was changed to:[enter]```[enter]{0}[enter]```

Image.Invalid: I was unable to obtain the image from that url. This could be due to an invalid format.
Image.None: I'm not displaying an image with the notification.
Image.Current: I will display this image along with the notification.
Image.Enabled: I've added the image to the notification.
Image.Disabled: I'll stop adding the image to the notification.

Info.Support: I'm sorry to hear you have problems with me. Come join my support server 'https://discord.gg/YFqUMDT'. Maybe someone there can help you.
Info.Invite: You can invite me to your server with this link: https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=286972781273546762&scope=bot&permissions=8 [enter]For more info on me, go take a look at https://discordbots.org/bot/286972781273546762, or use the help command in any of the discord servers I'm in.[enter]If you're in need of support, join my support server at 'https://discord.gg/YFqUMDT'.

Help.Unknown: I have no information for that command.
Help.Title: A list of my commands.[enter]Be sure to keep an eye on this list, as it might get updated with additional information.

Entertainment.Title: __**Entertainment**__
Entertainment.Message: Some may be useful, others are wacky.

Birthday.Title: __Birthday__
Birthday.Normal: {0}birthday _<username>_ - Sing a song for a happy fellow.

Chat.Title: __Chat__
Chat.Normal: {0}chat - Engage in a casual, but probably still weird, conversation with me.[enter]{0}chat <message> - Same as `chat`, but I'll start the conversation with the provided message.[enter]{0}chat stop - End the ongoing conversation.

CustomCommand.Title: __Custom Commands__
CustomCommand.Normal: {0}customcommands - Display some information about the usage of custom commands.[enter]{0}customcommands list - Display all custom commands of this server.
CustomCommand.Admin: {0}customcommands add _<command title>_ _<response>_ - Add a custom command for this server.[enter]{0}customcommands remove _<command title>_ - Remove one of this server's custom commands.

Music.Title: __Music__
Music.Normal: {0}music join - Join your voice channel.[enter]{0}music move - Move to your voice channel.[enter]{0}music leave - Leave the voice channel.[enter]{0}music play _<name>_ - Search for a song by its name and add it to the queue.[enter]{0}music play _<song url: youtube|soundcloud>_ - Add a song to the queue.[enter]{0}music play _<playlist url: youtube|soundcloud>_ - Add an entire playlist to the queue.[enter]{0}music pause - Pause the current song.[enter]{0}music unpause - Un-pause the current song.[enter]{0}music playing - Show what song is being played.[enter]{0}music queue - List the songs in the queue.[enter]{0}music shuffle - Shuffle all the songs in the queue.[enter]{0}music skip - Skip the song currently playing.[enter]{0}music skip _<amount>_ - Skip the given amount of songs.[enter]{0}music clear - Remove all songs from the queue.[enter]{0}music stop - Stop playing music and remove all songs from the queue.

Moderation.Title: __**Moderation**__
Moderation.Message: Collection of server configurations and administrative features.

Prefix.Title: __Command Prefix__
Prefix.Admin: {0}prefix - Show the command prefix I use for this server.[enter]{0}prefix set _<new prefix>_ - Change the command prefix I'll use for this server.

Language.Title: __Language__
Language.Admin: {0}language - Show the language I use for this server.[enter]{0}language list - Display a list of all supported languages.[enter]{0}language set _<language>_ - Change the language I'll use for this server.

Kick.Title: __Kick__
Kick.Admin: {0}kick _<user: name|id|mention>_ - Kick a user off the server.

Ban.Title: __Ban__
Ban.Admin: {0}ban - Display information about formatting the command.[enter]{0}ban _<user: name|id|mention>_ _<optional: duration>_ _<optional: reason>_ - Ban a user from the server. If a duration is provided, the ban will be lifted after that time has passed.

Automation.Title: __**Automation**__
Automation.Message: Mostly just configuration. Hopefully only needed every once in a while.

DynamicChannel.Title: __Dynamic Channels__
DynamicChannel.Admin: {0}dynamicchannels - Display information on the use of dynamic channels.[enter]{0}dynamicchannels _<config name>_ - Display detailed information of a specific configuration.[enter]{0}dynamicchannels list/overview - Display short information of all the configurations.[enter]{0}dynamicchannels add/configure _<config name>_ _<type: temp|perm>_ - Create a new dynamic channel configuration.[enter]{0}dynamicchannels delete/remove _<config name>_ - Remove a dynamic channel configuration.[enter]{0}dynamicchannels edit/modify/change _<config name>_ d_name/name _<new duplication name>_ - Change the name given to duplicated channels.[enter]{0}dynamicchannels edit/modify/change _<config name>_ assign/add/apply _<voicechannel: name|id>_ - Apply the configuration on a voice channel.[enter]{0}dynamicchannels edit/modify/change _<config name>_ remove/delete _<voicechannel: name|id>_ - Remove the configuration from a voice channel.

Notification.Title: __**Notifications**__
Notification.Message: Configurable messages that can be send automatically on events.

Welcome.Title: __Welcome__
Welcome.Admin: {0}welcome _<user: name|id|mention, user: name|id|mention, etc>_ - Manually send the notification message to one or multiple users.[enter]{0}welcome enable/on _<textchannel: name|id|mention>_ - Enable the automated welcome notifications. Notification messages will be send in the provided text channel.[enter]{0}welcome disable/off - Disable the automated welcome notifications.[enter]{0}welcome message - Display the current message used by the notification.[enter]{0}welcome message set _<message>_ - Change the message used by the notification.[enter]{0}welcome image - Display if and which image is being shown with the notification.[enter]{0}welcome image enable/on _<optional: image url>_ - Start showing an image with every notification. If no image url is provided, I'll use my own image.[enter]{0}welcome image disable/off - Stop showing the configured image with the notification.

Info.Title: __**Information**__
Info.Message: If you require some additional information or have some problems with me.

Help.Title: __Help__
Help.Normal: {0}help - Display the entire command list.[enter]{0}help _<command>_ - Display information about a specific command.

Invite.Title: __Invite__
Invite.Normal: {0}invite - Ask me for my invite link so you, or someone else, can add me to a server.

Note.Title: **Note**
Note.Message: A `/` between two parameters mean you can use either one of those (alias).[enter]Parameters in between `<>` are for you to fill in, unless they are marked as optional. A `|` in here means you can choose one of those options. If what you want to fill in contains spaces, you need to wrap it in between double quotes.[enter]Example:[enter]    `{0}customcommands add "Morning" "Nice day for fishing, ain't it?"`[enter]    `{0}dynamicchannels add "My config" temp`

Generic.Exception: Something went wrong. Please go to my support server (https://discord.gg/YFqUMDT) if the problem persists.
